name: Hungry Hungry Hamsters
description:
🐹 Hungry Hungry Hamsters

 

ALL assets (art, animation, code, design, audio, etc.) were made during a 48-hour game jam in March 2022. But please try out the more polished version (Version 1.0.2)! 📚 Story

As the head of your hamster family, your job is to feed your growing and hungry ham fam! They're quite picky, so be sure to take note of their favorite foods as you explore the food-filled tables. But beware of sushi cats and orange bats, they're on the hunt!

 

🎮 Controls

Keyboard
WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim
Left Click - Spit Food
Space/Shift - Dash

Gamepad
Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Aim
Right Bumper - Spit Food
Left Bumper - Dash

 

🎉 Credits

💻 Luna  |  Programming, UI/Art Implementation
💻 Sara  |  Programming
💻 John  |  Programming
🎨 Sola  |  Art, Animation, UI Design
🎶 Tommy  |  Music, SFX
